The video in the Facebook post has been: 300 times and was published on April 22, 2019.
The misleading Facebook post claims that: election bid based on Article 6A, point 3 of Indonesia's 1945 Constitution.
Article 6A: point 3 of the constitution states three requirements for winning a presidential election: having more than 50% of the votes, winning in at least 17 provinces, and having at least 20% of the votes in each of the provinces where the candidate lost.
The claim is false because the requireme: point 3 only apply to presidential elections with more than two pairs of candidates, as ruled by the Indonesia Constitutional Court in 2014.
